actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to raise the Veterans' Administration to the status of an executive department of the Government to be known as the "Department of Veterans' Affairs".

summary.text: Establishes the Department of Veterans' Affairs as an executive department of the United States Government headed by a Secretary. Provides for the staff and administrative positions of such Department. Provides for the transfer of functions to the Department.

titles.title: A bill to raise the Veterans' Administration to the status of an executive department of the Government to be known as the "Department of Veterans' Affairs".
